snippet: The last team to lead all of baseball at the All-Star break and fail to make the postseason was the 1993 Giants, and that was before the introduction of the wild card.
abstract: The last team to lead all of baseball at the All-Star break and fail to make the postseason was the 1993 Giants, and that was before the introduction of the wild card.

headline.main: Keeping Score: Being Best at Break Bodes Well for Yankees
headline.print_headline: Keeping Score: Being Best at Break Bodes Well for Yanks
